header.tagline: Senior Estimator & Quantity Surveyor - Diverse Sector Expertise

summary: Senior Estimator with 15+ years in construction sectors. Executed $200M+ in project calculations.

bullets.text: Managed provision of services to civil construction and real estate companies, focusing on quantity surveying processes and architectural adjustments.
metrics: Streamlined workflows reducing project delivery times by 15%

bullets.text: Coordinated a comprehensive analysis of tendering documents for accurate and competitive submission entries.
metrics: Achieved a submission success rate of over 75%

bullets.text: Executed detailed BOQ preparation, including complete documentation for tender and procurement processes.
Performed quantity take-offs across multiple disciplines, ensuring precision in project bids and cost estimations.
metrics: Reduced errors in take-off calculations by 20%

bullets.text: Assessed additional costs related to design variations to align budgets with client expectations.
metrics: Saved clients an average of 18% on project overages

bullets.text: Enabled residential, commercial, and infrastructure projects with an emphasis on accurate budgeting and compliance.
Generated detailed project reports to internal and external stakeholders, enhancing transparency and trust.

experience.company: Civil Infrastructure Group — Greater Melbourne Area, VIC
experience.title: Senior Estimator / Quantity Surveyor

bullets.text: Conducted thorough tender analysis and scope verification for infrastructure and civil projects, ensuring project alignment with client objectives.
Developed preliminary budgets from draft drawings and comprehensive tender documents.
Crafted detailed Bill of Quantities incorporating labour, materials, and equipment requisites.
metrics: Improved accuracy by 20% compared to previous estimations

bullets.text: Managed end-to-end submission processes, including cost justifications and methodology outlines.
metrics: Success rate for tender wins improved by 22%

bullets.text: Evaluated cost impact of design variations, advising economically optimal construction methodologies.
Collaborated with contractors and builders in scope clarification and work method proposals for cost containment.
metrics: Achieved alignment 100% of the time by project end

bullets.text: Direct supervision of project progress and budget tracking to optimize accuracy in forecast and actual expenditures.
Facilitated analysis of tender documents, ensuring absolute clarity on project deliverables and cost expectations.
Performed technical coordination with architects and engineers, streamlining project scopes and bid proposals.
metrics: Reduced project ambiguities reducing bid rejections by 20%

bullets.text: Developed detailed BOQs and final accounts for awarded projects, ensuring financial transparency with stakeholders.
metrics: Delivered all project accounts within budgetary constraints

bullets.text: Engaged with site and management teams to execute project designs in adherence to budget and schedule expectations.
Managed cost estimations based on preliminary designs, improving competitive edge in tenders.

education.additionalInfo: Course focused on advanced building practices and construction management.
Strong foundation in architectural design and urban planning.
Certificate focused on project management in construction environments.

additionalExperience: Long-term member of the Brazilian Council of Architecture and Urbanism, contributing to a number of architectural standards reviews and development projects.
